original: Sector 2 Artillery Note
translation: 2区炮兵通知

original:
From Enclave High Command
Artillery Order #553
Sector 2

The Brotherhood of Steel have cleared the outer perimeter of the base.  Clearance has been given to use artillery strikes on Sector 2 if, and only if, all other resources have been exhausted and targets are clearly visible.  Exercise extreme caution.
translation:
自 英克雷最高指挥部
炮兵命令 #553
第2战区

钢铁兄弟会已经消灭了基地的外围。对第2战区使用炮击的清除令已被下达。假如，只是假如，在所有其他可用物资耗尽且各目标均清晰可见时发动。务必慎重。

original: Deathclaw Officer's Report
translation: 关于死亡爪的军官报告

original: Our detachment established basecamp outside Olney. The township's been given a wide berth, and we deployed our detainment units behind a slope to avoid being caught upwind of the deathclaw population.  We're not sure if these things use pheromones or any other kind of communication, but I'm not taking a chance.
translation: 我们分队在奥尔尼郊外设立了营地。与小镇保持了较大的距离，我们将捕获单位部署在一个斜坡后面以避免处于定为捕获目标的死亡爪族群的上风处。我们不确定这些生物是否通过信息素或是其他任何方式来进行沟通，但我不想发生意外。

original: Deathclaw Outpost Orders
translation: 关于死亡爪的前哨指令

original:
RRD-HA23-P 
WELCOME:  

1.  Establish a perimiter around township of Olney.

2.  Verify reports of DEATHCLAW population in township and debrief superiors on your findings.

3.  Acquire DEATHCLAW specimens as opportunity allows, minimizing casualties to local DEATHCLAW population and Enclave personnel.
translation:
RRD-HA23-P
欢迎：

1.  在小镇奥尔尼附近建立一个大本营。

2.  核实关于小镇中死亡之爪群落的报告然后在你的调查报告中询问长官任务。

3.  在情况允许的情况下抓获一只死亡之爪作为标本，尽量减少当地死亡之爪和人员伤亡。

original: Holy Water Pamphlet
translation: 圣水宣传单

original:
Good people of Megaton, your salvation is at hand!

We are the Apostles of Eternal Light. To heal this wounded city, we are willing to provide any and all supplicants with cleansing holy water. 

Come to our monastery in Springvale, and Brother Gerard will minister to your every need.

We will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the Water of Light.
translation:
核弹镇善良的人们, 你们的救赎即将到来!

我们是永恒之光的使者。我们将提供一切可能的设备的神圣的清水来治疗这座受伤的城市。 

来我们春之谷的教堂，加拉德兄弟会满足大家的一切需求。

光明之泉的圣水将会无偿的提供给需要的人。

original: Alpha Cell Entry 01
translation: 阿尔法电池记录01

original:
Project Code: AC-PPE-47
Report: GATS2

Project Entry 01: Deconstruction

Upon first look after dismantling of the Alpha cell, we noticed a structure similar to one of our standard voltaic cells.    After further investigation we noticed that the fluid being used as the electrolyte is of indeterminate origin and have sent samples off to our sister lab under Task: AC-PPE-47-N.
translation:
项目代号：AC-PPE-47
报告：GATS2

项目目录 01：解构

在首次观察分解阿尔法细胞时，我们发现一个结构类似于我们的标准细胞。经过进一步研究，我们注意到，流体被用来作为电解液的来源不明，根据任务我们把样本送往了我们的姐妹实验室： AC-PPE-47-N。

original: Incident Report 08-07-07

Incident Report 08-07-77

Reporting Officer:  Harold Callahan

Fire alarm was sounded at approximately 10:05 A.M. in the vending area near Cafeteria B3. I immediately rushed to the location and encountered General Robert Dobbs kicking a Nuka-Cola machine repeatedly. General Dobbs ignored my order to stand down from his actions and drew his sidearm. He then proceeded to fire 7 shots into the machine, rupturing several bottles and piercing the coin box. After the coins began pouring to the floor, he picked up one of them and exclaimed "Stealing from a superior officer? Are you out of your MIND, soldier?" He holstered his sidearm and looked at me, then back at the machine and simply stated, "Well don't just stand there, I believe this soldier needs a medic, son."
The general was relieved of his sidearm and placed in our lockup facility until Metro D.C. Police arrived to pick him up.
translation:
事件报告08-07-77

报告警官：哈罗德·克拉汉

火警大约是在上午10:05响起的，地点在B3自助餐厅附近的外卖区。我马上赶赴事发地点，在那里正看到罗伯特·多博斯将军正在不停地踢一台核子可乐贩售机。多博斯将军无视我制止他的命令还拔出了随身武器。接着他连续向贩售机射了7枪，打碎了几个瓶子还射穿了投币箱。硬币倾泄了一地，他捡起了其中的一个大喊道：“敢偷高级军官的钱？你“疯了”么，士兵？”他收起他的佩枪并看着我，而后背对着贩售机轻描淡写的说，“别光在那站着，我认为这个士兵需要个医生，孩子。”
将军被缴械了佩枪并被安置在我们的紧闭室直到地铁特区警方到达并将其带走。

original: Incident Report 08-16-07

Incident Report 08-16-77

Reporting Officer:  Harold Callahan

Secretary Maybel Meyers from Accounting Division called us down here and reported an altercation between two other secretaries. Sergeant Deke DaSilva and I arrived at the scene to find two female secretaries, Carol Wallace and Isabelle Franks, scuffling on the floor. We broke up the altercation and took their statements. Ms. Wallace was accusing Ms. Franks of being a "...spy for those damn Red bastards!" and stating that she overheard "...secret conversations between Isabelle and her Chinese conspirators!" Ms. Franks simply stated she was "Speaking to her husband about weekend plans." Both ladies were given a warning and sent home for the day by their supervisors.

Tensions have been running high lately ever since the incidents in Alaska, and this is just one example of the effect it is having on everyone.
translation:
事件报告 08-16-77

报告警官：哈罗德·卡拉汉

会计部门的梅伯尔·迈尔斯秘书叫我们来这里，并报告了另外两个秘书之间的争吵事件。得克·德索瓦警官和我到达现在时发现两个女秘书，卡罗尔·华莱士和伊莎贝尔·弗兰克斯，正在地板上扭打。我们将她们拉开并停她们陈述。华莱士女士责难弗兰克斯女士说她是“该死的共匪特务！”并叙述了她偶然听到的“伊莎贝尔和她的中共阴谋家之间的秘密会谈。”弗兰克斯女士则反驳说她只是“在和她的丈夫讨论关于周末的计划。”两位女士都受到了警告并由他们的监督者送回了家。

自从发生军事冲突发生以来阿拉斯加的局势越来越紧张，这只是对所有人产生的影响中的一个例子而已。

original: Incident Report 08-22-07

Incident Report 08-22-77

Reporting Officer:  Harold Callahan

A silent alarm tripped on Stairwell 117, and I immediately responded. As I approached the stairwell entrance, I heard noises as if someone was in duress. I drew my weapon and entered by kicking open the door. I discovered Ronald Bales from Intelligence and Analysis in a compromising position with Wilma Firestone, a secretary from the Accounting Division. I gave them both a warning, and told Mr. Bales that this is his fifth and final one... the next time he is discovered performing this type of activity on Pentagon property, he'll be fined and disciplinary action will be recommended.
translation:
事件报告 08-22-77

报告警官：哈罗德·卡拉汉

一个无声警报在第117楼梯井响了起来，我立即就去处理它。当我接近楼梯井时，我听到某人似乎遭到威胁的声音。我抽出武器并踢开门冲了进去。我发现情报和分析处的罗纳德·巴莱斯正在从威胁威尔玛·费尔斯通, 一个会计部门的秘书。我给了他们一人一个警告，并告诉巴莱斯先生这是他第五个并且是最后一个警告了......下次他再被发现对五角大楼财产做出此类行为时，他将被罚款而且纪律处分并被上报有关部门。

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0089
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0089\n\nRemmings over at the Museum of Technology is complaining again about the Planetarium system malfunctioning. I've replaced the playback unit on that thing 3 times now. Seems like the system keeps crashing and trying to restart itself, then crashes again... keeps repeating that cycle until it's completely rebooted. I suggest that we acquire a new type of system in next year's budget. The cost of replacing it now and fitting a new system is cheaper than the amount we've spent shoving in replacement parts.
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089\n\n在科学博物馆的游客又在抱怨天文馆系统失灵了。我已经把那个回放单元替换过三次了。看来似乎系统依然会崩溃，并试图自动重启，然后再次崩溃...不断重复这种循环直到它完全重新启动。我建议在明年的预算里加入一项购买新系统的费用。相对于更换它重新安装一个新系统会便宜不少。

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0089
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0086\n\nBrantseg over at the National Archives is requesting a new brain software package for their "TJEFF002 Thomas Jefferson" Protectron. The original software was wiped and replaced with a radio uplink and frequency scanning software package which is simply receiving and broadcasting local radio stations. I suggest we encrypt the next brain package so this type of software purchase is not necessary.
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0086\n\n国家档案馆的布兰特赛格正在申请一个新的脑波软件包给他们的"TJEFF002 托马斯·杰斐逊"型自动护卫。原有的软件被删除并替换上了一个无线电上行链接及频率扫描软件包用以取代单向接收和发送本地的无线电站点的功能。我建议我们对以后的脑波数据包加密，所以这类软件是没有必要购买的。

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0089
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0085\n\nWe've logged a fourth request from Dr. Gillian Taylor over at the National Aquarium regarding a new tank she wishes to be constructed for her whale exhibition. I've already spoken to Director Barnicky, and he maintains that a new exhibit is out of the question and the current one is becoming far too expensive to maintain. Director Barnicky has already spoken to the San Francisco Aquarium, and they have agreed to begin construction of an appropriately sized tank and viewing area for Dr. Taylor's whales. He's also negotiated with that facility to have Dr. Taylor transferred, and I support this decision.
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0085\n\n我们已经记录第四个关于吉莉安·泰勒博士在国家水族馆建造新型水箱的要求了，她希望能进行鲸鱼展览。我已经和巴尼金主任谈过 ，他坚持认为，进行一个新的展览是不可能的因为当前的维护已经过于昂贵了。巴尼金主任已经和旧金山水族馆交涉过，他们已经同意开始建造一个适当大小的水箱用于展览泰勒博士的鲸。他已经工厂达成协议并移交泰勒博士，我支持这个决定。

original: Sorry, My Darling
translation: 抱歉，爱人

original: Lag-Bolt's Note
translation: “惯犯”螺钉的便条

original:
Hey Lags!

This your big bro! Hope you got the package. I had two of these things specially made for us in Virginia by The Tailor. He's a master at this stuff. I know you and your chick will love it. Try not to wear her out too fast, if you catch my drift.

Hugs,
Lug-Nut
translation:
嘿！兄弟！

是我啊，你的好弟兄！希望你已经收到包裹了。我有两个特制的这东西，是我们在弗吉尼亚州的裁缝做的。他可是做这个的大师！我知道你和你的“女友”会爱上这个的。千万不要太快穿上它，如果你懂我的意思的话。

来抱抱
“笨蛋”螺母

original: Big Town Mission Report
translation: 大镇任务报告

original: Big Town Mission Report:\n\nMission failure. Ambushed by Mutants. Lost one initiate, caravan driver, and mule. Survivor in critical condition at Citadel.
translation: 大镇任务报告:\n\n任务失败。被超级变种人伏击。损失一名新兵、一名商人以及一匹牲口。在大本营的幸存者情况危险。

original: Megaton Mission Report
translation: 核弹镇任务报告

original: Megaton Mission Report:\n\nMission successful. Met a local wandering outside the city, a Mother Curie. Dropped off the goods with instructions to distribute.
translation: 核弹镇任务报告:\n\n任务成功。遇到一个在城外游荡的当地人-居里老妈。根据指示卸载并分发货物。

original: Rivet City Mission Report
translation: 铆钉城任务报告

original:
Rivet City Mission Report:

Mission successful.

 [We ought to just build a pipeline. - B.]
translation:
铆钉城任务报告:

任务完成。

 [我们本来仅仅只是来建条管道的。 - B.]

original: Entry 1
translation: 记录1

original: This place is a total disaster. Hopefully I’ll get this distribution system set up soon and I can get back to the Citadel. Shouldn’t take more than two weeks. I’ve already been in consultation with the  Rivet City Council. They have tentatively agreed to take over the Water Distribution Network for us once we’ve worked out the kinks. Something tells me there’s going to be more than a few of those.
translation: 这个地方彻底的悲剧了。所幸我很快就能建立好配送系统然后回到五角大本营。完成这件事应该不会用到超过两周的时间。我已经和铆钉城议会开始磋商。他们初步决定在我们解决这个问题后接管供水管网，但是我感觉问题可不止这一点点。

original: Entry 2
translation: 记录2

original: I think Rothchild is really upset with me this time. He sent me Scribes who apparently failed their Cartography training. I don’t have time for this.
translation: 我想罗斯查得这次是真对我失望了. 他送来的书记官明显连制图学都没过关. 我可没时间为这个磨叽.

original: Entry 3
translation: 记录3

original: I’m getting practically no cooperation. Rothchild ignores my messages. And the  Knights stuck with delivery duties are more than a little resentful. I don’t want to have to send them out anymore than they want to go.
translation: 我现在几乎得不到任何人的合作。罗斯查德根本就无视我的报告。而骑士们则坚持责任比一点不满更重要。我可不想再放任让他们想去哪就去哪了。

original: Entry 4
translation: 记录4

original: Dr. Li left today. Went up north to the Commonwealth. What a bitch.  She couldn’t handle the fact that even these morons Rothchild sent me were capable of improving upon her work. It’s no wonder she never got the thing working without help in the first place. Anyway, to hell with Dr. Li. Good riddance.
translation: 李博士今天离开了。往北去了联邦。这个烂婊子。事实上她连罗斯查德送来的白痴都可以改善的工作都处理不了。所以毫无疑问如果没有别人的帮助她都无法让这个东西工作起来。无论如何，去他娘的李博士。老子解放了。

original: Entry 5
translation: 记录5

original: First casualty reported today. I know compared to the death tolls of the war it will barely register back at the Citadel. But still… I hate being responsible, even indirectly, for another man’s death. It brings back unpleasant memories.
translation: 今天第一份伤亡报告。我明白相比在战争中的死去的人数，这点伤亡几乎不会登记回五角大本营。但是我依然厌恶背负这责任，即使是间接的。它唤起了我不愉快的回忆。

original: Entry 6
translation: 记录6

original: So many caravans missing in action. The Rivet City escorts I can understand. They haven’t had much blooding, holed up in that boat of theirs. Sure, I’ve gotten more Initiates than full fledged Knights, since it’s all hands in the war. But still, even a couple of heavily armed Initiates should be able to handle escorting a mule and driver across the wastes.
translation: 这么多运输队在行动中失踪了。我能理解铆钉城的押运队。躲在船里头的他们从来没见过那么多鲜血。当然，鉴于这种全面战争的状态，我手上的新兵比老练的骑士还多。但是即使是一队武装过的新兵也应该可以处理这点护送一队牲口和车夫穿越废土的小事啊。

original: Entry 7
translation: 记录 7

original:
So this Ghoul from Underworld, Griffon, offered to pay me for shipments of water. Lyons wouldn’t approve, but I don’t care. We need the caps and the technology he’s offering. I can use it to fund the other deliveries.

One day Lyons will come to his senses and agree that selling the water is the smartest thing. Let supply and demand fuel the delivery system. This bleeding heart charity of his is going to bring down the Brotherhood. We’re at war! We shouldn’t be expending resources on delivering water. At any rate, we can do that after we wipe out the Enclave. Sometimes I wonder if Lyons has gone senile.

I should delete this entry in case someone important audits my files. Ah, screw it. It might be time for me to leave the Brotherhood, anyway. Not sure where’d I go, though.
translation:
于是这个地下城的僵尸格里芬，出钱雇我运水。里昂斯不同意，不过我才不在乎。我们需要他提供的瓶盖还有科技。我可以用它来筹建另一支运输队。

终有一天里昂斯会明白并同意贩卖纯净水是最明智的买卖。让供求来给运输系统增添动力。他的妇人之仁最终将会断送兄弟会。我们正处在战争时期！我们不该在送水的事情上耗费资源。至少，在我们可以在打垮英克雷之后再做。有时我纳闷里昂斯是不是老糊涂了。

我应该删除这个条目以防万一有什么大人物查我的帐。啊，该死的的。总之，或许是我该离开兄弟会的时候了。尽管我不知道自己该何去何从。

original: Entry 8
translation: 记录 8

original: I dno’t rember teh last time I slept for more than tihrty minutes.  I’m so damn tired jkhkjkjsdfg sdfgssdfgsd  ha. apparently I just nodded off and hit my face on the keyboard. I can’t take this anyomre!!!!11!!
translation: 我都不记得上次我睡够30分钟是哪辈子的事了。我真他妈的累死了jkhkjkjsdfgsdfgssdfgsd 哈。看来我是打了个盹脸摔在键盘上了。我再也受不了啦!!!!11!!

original: Entry 9
translation: 记录 9

original: Where the hell is everyone? So many caravans still MIA.
translation: 每个家伙都死到哪里去了？如此多的商队依然音讯全无。

original: Entry 10
translation: 记录 10

original: Lepelletier keeps sending me dispatches requesting additional resources. I don’t have anything for her. Not sure they’ll be able to handle this water distribution after all. Great. I’ll be stuck here forever.
translation: 里贝里蒂尔不断送信来向我索要额外的资源。我已经没什么东西好给她了。不知道他们到底能不能处理好这次供水计划。棒呆了。我要永远困死在这儿了。

original: Entry 11
translation: 记录 11

original: I'm ignoring Megaton's requests for more water until I can determine what the hell happened. The caravan reported in, successful. I have no reason to doubt the report.
translation: 在搞清楚到底发生了什么活见鬼的破事之前我不会理睬核弹镇要求更多水的要求。商队都报告过的,事办成了。我没有理由去怀疑这份报告。

original: Current Missions
translation: 当前任务

original:
Andale: MIA

Big Town: returned, mission failure - Ambushed by Mutants, casualties: 1

Citadel: returned, mission success

Canterbury Commons: outbound

Dukov’s Place: MIA

GNR: outbound

Republic of Dave:  MIA

Rivet City: returned, mission successful

Tenpenny Tower:  MIA
translation:
安戴尔: 战斗中失踪

大镇: 返回, 任务失败 - 被超级变种人伏击, 伤亡: 1

五角大本营: 返回, 任务成功

坎特伯雷社区: 在外驻扎

杜克夫的家: 战斗中失踪

GNR: 在外驻扎

核弹镇: 返回, 任务成功

戴夫共和国:  战斗中失踪

铆钉城: 返回, 任务成功

特佩尼大厦: 战斗中失踪

original: Entry 12
translation: 记录 12

original: Heard that the kid who helped start the Purifier finally woke up.
translation: 听说那个帮助开启净水设施的孩子终于醒来了。

original: Entry 13
translation: 记录 13

original: I think Lyons suspects something. He must have a plant here. How the hell would he know about the “missing” water shipments? I’ve been stonewalling him. How the hell does he have time to worry about us with that war going on?
translation: 我认为里昂斯在怀疑着什么。他必须得在这有个工厂。他到底是怎么知道运水货物失踪的破事的？我一直被他碍手碍脚。到底要怎么搞才能让那老鬼有时间去继续操心我们和战争的事？

original: Entry 14
translation: 记录 14

original: I’m seriously considering murdering these Project Purity lab coats. Ungrateful, whining, good-for-nothing, bothersome ingrates the lot of them.
translation: 我曾经考虑过干掉所有参与净水工程的研究员。这群忘恩负义，牢骚满腹，又没出息，又烦死人的白痴。

original: Entry 15
translation: 记录 15

original: I wish somebody would fix that damn leak! The dripping is driving me crazy!
translation: 我希望有人能去修修那个漏洞! 滴水声都快把我逼疯了!

original: Entry 16
translation: 记录 16

original: I give up. This is hopeless.
translation: 我放弃。没希望了。

original: Entry 17
translation: 记录 17

original: Wow… Megaton’s gone. I know I was complaining about them… but, all those people! Erased in a single moment in time… I can't imagine.
translation: 哇噢，核弹镇消失了。我记得我曾经埋怨过他们？但是，所有人! 一瞬间全被核谐了!真是无法想象。

original: Current Missions
translation: 当前任务

Andale: MIA

Citadel: returned, mission success

Canterbury Commons: outbound

Dukov’s Place: MIA

GNR: outbound

Megaton: returned, mission successful

Republic of Dave:  MIA

Rivet City: returned, mission successful

GNR: 在外驻扎

戴夫共和国:  战斗中失踪

铆钉城: 返回, 任务成功

特佩尼大厦: 战斗中失踪

original: Petty Cash
translation: 零钱

original: 24 caps (no that’s not a typo)
translation: 24枚瓶盖(不，那没弄错)

original: Available Requisitions
translation: 可申请物品清单

original:
Available Assets:

1 Plasma Rifle
2 Power Armor Suits
4 Assault Rifles
1 Mini-gun
1 Missile Launcher (3 missiles)
6 Medkits
20+ Chems (various)
translation:
可获奖赏:

1把等离子步枪
2套动力装甲
4把突击步枪
1挺多管机枪
1把火箭弹发射器 (包含3枚火箭弹)
6套医疗包
20多份化学药物(数种)

original: Mechanic: D.T.\n\nWe're still having a bit of trouble getting the new SYL-02 Xoted Mainframe adapted to our train drive systems down here. It's going to take another 72 hours to get it fully up and running. I've been pulling triple shifts for the last two days already AND the supervisors are constantly on our backs blaming us for the delays when THEY bought an incompatible system. I wish that I could get to sleep and just get this over with...this is only high school bullshit. I'm lost, I'm freaking and everybody knows... everybody's watching.
translation: 机修工：D.T.\n\n我们还有一些麻烦的新SYL- 02 Xoted中央处理器在我们的列车驱动系统进行调试。他们需要再花72小时才能完全启动和运行。过去两天我带了三轮班，但主管不断责怪我们拖延工程当他们购买了根本不兼容的系统时。我希望能一劳永逸地解决这件事然后去睡觉...这简直是高中生的废话。我失败了，每个人都知道我该死…每个人都看到了。

original: Mechanic: D.T.\n\nThe switch track over between Adams Air Force Base and the White House main line is sticking again. I've dispatched a crew to repair it. I expect the line to be down no more than maybe a day. We can shunt all the trains to the alternate inbound line and just run them on half schedule or something for now. Just a suggestion.
translation: 机修工：D.T.\n\n亚当斯空军基地和白宫主干线之间的轨道转换又出问题了了。我派了一组工作人员去修理。我预期线路将在一天之内恢复通畅。现在我们可以分流所有列车入站的备用线并让他们按照列车时刻表的半数运行或诸如此类的临时举措。这只是我的一个建议。

original: Mechanic: D.T.\n\nAfter debating for a few days, the powers that be have decided to change out the vocal interface on the Xoted Mainframe from male to female. Why? So they can give it a cute acronym and name it "Margot." Then they can trot it around for the press so we can all see where our hard-earned taxpayer dollars went. Wow, what a colossal waste of my time. Now I have to pull the mainframe's circuit array and flush the memory all to get a new voice installed... great, just great.
translation: 机修工：D.T.\n\n经过了几天的争论，当局决定将主机的音频界面从男性改为女性。 因为这样他们就可以给它一个可爱的代号并将其命名为“玛格特”。然后，他们就能逃开舆论的压力，我们都可以看到我们这些纳税人辛苦挣来的钱去哪儿了。哇哦，多么浪费我的时间啊！现在，我不得不抽出主机电路阵列并清除内存以安装新的音频界面…太棒了，真是太棒了。

original: Mechanic: D.T.\n\nOh, today was a beauty. I was called up to the Senatorial Lounge near the White House station and someone decided to make a political statement by spray painting graffiti all over the walls inside the Lounge containing more than a fair share of Chinese racial slurs. They must have broken in while it was closed and did the damage. Hooray for security... they really dropped the ball on this one. Never send a robot to do a man's job I say. I spent the better part of the day scrubbing walls clean of that filth and installing new fixtures. Joy.
translation: 机修工：D.T.\n\n噢，今天真是美丽的一天。我被传唤因为在白宫车站附近的参议员休息室有人用喷漆在墙壁上喷了一个份政治声明，参议员休息室的墙壁上被喷得到处都是对中国的种族歧视和辱骂。他们必须有突破当被关闭并造成损害时。安全万岁…他们真的放弃了这一个球。我说他们永远都不会派一个机器人做这个工作。我花了一天里最好的时间擦洗干净的墙壁上的污物和安装新设备。真高兴。

original: Mechanic: D.T.\n\nWe got the new Sentinel Unit up and running today. Pretty bad-ass. Not only does it have maintenance capability, so I can remote command it to do repairs, but it also is a great riot suppression unit... we can use it if we ever have any protesters break in down here again. Finally, a worthwhile addition to the robot fleet.
translation: 机修工：D.T.\n\n今天我们得到的岗哨单位已经开始运行了。漂亮的坏家伙。它不但有维修能力，我能远程操作它进行维修工作，而且还是一个强大的镇暴单位…如果我们再遇到任何的抗议我们就能用这个单位彻底粉碎它。终于，一个有价值的单位加入机器人队伍中了。

original:
Hey downstairs - 

This new guy you sent to help out is awful. I mean, he can barely tie his shoes. This is advanced technical equipment up here, and I can't have him work on it. He'll probably end up accidentally calling an orbital strike down on the base or something.

Here's an idea - how about you send the guy that cleans the toilets up here and I can give him the job instead. Is it really that hard to find decent help?
translation:
嘿，楼下的 -

你派来的那个新伙计真是太糟糕了。我的意思是，他甚至都没办法绑好自己的鞋带。我这儿是先进技术部门，我可不能让他继续在这儿工作。他很可能一不小心就搞出像让卫星轨道炮发射摧毁这儿或者别的类似的事情。

我有个主意 - 不如你派他去扫厕所怎样?而你再给我再找个能工作的人来替代。这是个两全其美的法子吧？

original:
Hey downstairs, it's me again - 

Are we ever going to get a tech up here to work on this satellite tracking equipment? I swear it's offline every couple of days, and then it's literally hours of work before I have the system online and linked up to the satellite again.

This is ridiculous.
translation:
嘿，楼下的，又是我 -

到底什么时候在这个卫星追踪设施里我们才能得到一个真正的技术人员？我发誓这玩意儿每两三天就自动离线一次，然后我就得把所有的工作时间花在把系统重新联线到卫星上。

真是荒谬。

original:
Guys - 

Strike two. This is the second dimwit you've sent up here, and I'm getting tired of it. I thought he was ok at first, but by lunchtime his Mentats had worn off and he could barely hold a conversation let alone work on a satellite control terminal. I can't have a junkie up here spacing out as soon as his pills wear off.

Fix this.
translation:
伙计 -

俩混球了。这已经是你扔到这里的第二个蠢蛋了, 我已经开始烦这套了。一开始我还觉得他蛮不错的，没想到还没等到吃午饭他的曼他特药效就过了，之后他连正常说话都办不到更别说一个人好好待在卫星通讯终端上工作了。我不能忍受一个瘾君子待在我这里，在他的药瘾彻底戒掉前把他带了滚。

快搞定这破事。

original:
ROBOTS ARE FREAKING OUT! - 

About fifteen minutes ago, all of the robots in the place just went haywire and started attacking everyone. The guards and the new guy managed to lock them in the storage area, but we need someone up here to sort them out immediately.

What's going on down there anyway?
translation:
该死的机器人！ -

大约十五分钟前，所有位置上的机器人突然出现故障并开始攻击所有人。警卫和新来的伙计设法把他们锁在了储藏区，但我们需要有人马上把机器人问题彻底解决掉。

究竟发生了什么事情？

original: Dunbar's Note
translation: 邓巴的便条

original:
If you're reading this, it's because you might be able to help.

We're thinking about branching out. Underworld was a good start, but we've found an even safer place for us to set up a new place to call home.

Old Olney.

No one ever goes there. No one would ever think to look for us there. There's tons of space under the town. So we're looking for a few strong backs to help knock down some walls, clear some space underground, and help get things up and running.

-S
translation:
如果你正在阅读这份笔记，那是因为你能为我们提供一些帮助。

我们正在考虑关于扩大活动范围的事情。地下世界是个好的开始，但我们不得不为我们自己建立一个更安全的场所去安置一个我们能称之为家的地方。

老奥尔尼。

没人去过那里。没人会想到去那里寻找我们。在镇子的地底下有大量的空间。我们正在寻找一些强有力的支持，以协助我们打通一些墙壁，清除地下的空间，帮我们让这件事运作起来。

-S

original: Missile
translation: 导弹

original: Laser Beam
translation: 激光束

original: Radioactive Gore
translation: 辐射血块

original: GREETING
translation: 问好

original: Nothing to see here, outsider.
translation: 这没什么好看的，外来人。

original: Nothing to report.
translation: 没有异常。

original: Keep moving, Wastelander.
translation: 不要停下来，游民。

original: Move along, outsider.
translation: 一边去，外来人。

original: Everything's above board.
translation: 一切都是光明正大的.

original: We're all clear here.
translation: 这里解决了。

original: We've got this area locked down.
translation: 这区域已经被我们封锁了。

original: You can get all the water you want for free. The Brotherhood's giving it away at the Purifier. Hadn't you heard?
translation: 你可以免费弄到水。兄弟会在净化器那儿白送呢。你没听说吗？

original: Look, bud, this water's for Rivet City. Go get your own from the Purifier if you want some.
translation: 听着，哥们儿，这水是属于铆钉城如果你也想要谁的话可以自己去净化器那儿随便取。

original: Back off. I'm not looking for any trouble.
translation: 退后。我不想惹麻烦。

original: The purified water's killing all the mirelurks living in the Basin.
translation: 净水正在杀死池子中的泥沼蟹。

original: Lucky me, I get to pull out the floaters and roast them.
translation: 我真走运，我得把这些残骸弄上来都烤了。

original: You may want to stand back, unless you've got a strong stomach.
translation: 你最好靠后站，除非你能忍住不恶心。

original: I gotta finish burning these floaters before they foul up the water.
translation: 我得赶紧烧掉这些残骸免得它们污染水源。

original: Funny how the purified water is actually killing them.
translation: 真有趣，净水是怎么杀掉他们的。

original: I never realized how many of these things were living down there.
translation: 我从没意识到这里居然有这么多这种东西？

original: Hey, feel free to take a shot at any lurks you see in the Basin.
translation: 嗨，下次再看到池子里有泥沼蟹的话，尽管开枪吧。

original: They're all dying -- don't like the clean water, I guess.
translation: 它们正濒临死亡 -- 我猜，它们不喜欢清洁的水。

original: Easier to just pop 'em in the head. Otherwise they die on the bottom and don't float up until they're good and ripe.
translation: 射它们的头会更容易些。否则它们会死水底，要多很久才会浮上来的。

original: Not the most exciting job I ever had, but you gotta admit, it beats pulling the floaters out of the Basin. Ha ha ha.
translation: 我这工作说不上有意思，但是你得承认，把漂浮物从池子的水里弄出来可真恶心啊。哈哈哈。

original: Let me know if you see any live ones.
translation: 如果你看到有活着的话就告诉我。

original: What do you want?
translation: 你想要什么？

original: Can you believe these Brotherhood assholes? They won't give us enough water to last until the next shipment!
translation: 你能相信那些兄弟会的混蛋么？在下一批货之前他们不打算提供我们水了！

original: We're not going to let them leave with that water though. We need it.
translation: 我们不会让他们带走水的。我们需要它。

original: What are they going to do, anyway? Kill us for stealing some free water?
translation: 他们想怎么样？为了得到些免费的水而把我们杀了？

original: Whew! I didn't think they'd just open up on us like that. Trigger happy bastards!
translation: 嘿呦！我可没想到他们会对我们这么直接。干掉那些活蹦乱跳的混蛋！

original: Shit, if the Citadel hears about this... we gotta clean up this mess before word gets around...
translation: 该死，如果五角大本营知道了这件事……我们必须在事情传开之前赶紧清理掉这个烂摊子……

original: I'm kinda busy here, alright?
translation: 我现在有点忙，行行好可以吗？

original: Don't you realize by now, you'll get nothing from me, you damn dirty merc!
translation: 到现在你还不明白吗，从我这里你什么也得不到，你这肮脏的佣兵！

original: Wait a minute... who are you? Hey, help me out of here! These Talon apes nabbed me while I was scouting the place.
translation: 等等……你是谁？嘿，快救我出去！这群鹰爪的畜生在我侦察这片区域的时候抓住了我。

original: I could probably free myself in a few more minutes, but why don't you save me the trouble and just let me loose?
translation: 其实在给我一点时间的话我自己也能逃出去，但你为何不帮个忙，现在就给我松绑？

original: Thanks, friend. But I've still got work to do.
translation: 谢谢，朋友。但我还有工作要做。

original: Now that's what I call a good day's work.
translation: 这才是我说的大买卖。

original: Talon Company's been ambushing our water caravans. I guess they thought we wouldn't figure out who was doing it.
translation: 鹰爪公司持续地伏击我们的运水商队。我猜他们以为我们查不出是谁在捣鬼。

original: As soon as Paladin Jensen gets back from scouting the base, we're going to level the place. Kill every last one of those scumbag mercs.
translation: 一等詹森圣骑士侦查完基地回来，我们就踏平这里。把这些该死的佣兵都杀光。

original: Talon Company's going to be sorry they messed with the Brotherhood. Now what the hell is taking Jensen so long?
translation: 鹰爪公司将会对招惹兄弟会感到后悔的。不过说起来詹森怎么他妈的去了那么久？

original: Come on, it's gonna be fun.
translation: 来啊，一定会很有趣的。

original: I think there's still some more Talon boys hiding around here.
translation: 我想这儿仍然有很多鹰爪的小崽子藏在附近。

original: See if Talon Company messes with the Brotherhood again.
translation: 看看鹰爪公司还敢不敢再来招惹兄弟会。

original: This is what happens to people who fuck with the Brotherhood.
translation: 这就是跟兄弟会作对的下场。

original: Damn slavers! Just what we need, another pissed off gang of wasters gunning for our water.
translation: 该死的奴隶贩子！正好，又一伙讨厌的暴徒来抢水了。

original: We've taken over some of the water caravans from the Brotherhood. I thought we could handle it, but ... we'll be lucky to make it back alive.
translation: 我们从兄弟会那里接了几只运水商队。我想我们能应付，但是 ……能不能平安回来就要看运气了。

original: I just want to get back to Rivet City without getting my head blown off.
translation: 我只希望能够平平安安地回到铆钉城。

original: Are you going our way? We sure could use some extra firepower.
translation: 你跟我们同路么？多支枪总是好的。

original: I gotta find a less dangerous line of work, like Yao Guai wrangling.
translation: 我得找份不那么危险的工作，像是与妖怪争辩。

original: I'm going to kill Lepelletier if I ever get back to Rivet City alive. This is a damn suicide mission!
translation: 如果我还有命回铆钉城的话我一定要杀了莱佩莱捷。这任务简直是他妈的自杀！

original: We're all going to die. They all want to kill us. It's hopeless, you understand? Hopeless!
translation: 我们都会死的。他们全都想杀了我们。这根本毫无希望，你知道吗？毫无希望！

original: Why the hell did I ever sign up for caravan duty?
translation: 我他妈的是怎么想的签了那该死的运水合同的？

original: Sorry, we don't need whatever you're selling. This caravan is on a tight schedule.
translation: 对不起，我们不需要你卖的任何东西。这只商队的行程很紧凑。

original: We're running water caravans for the Brotherhood, hadn't you heard? Rivet City is bringing water to the Wasteland!
translation: 我们是替兄弟会运水的商队，你还没听说？铆钉城正给废土带去净水！

original: The water's not for sale. All spoken for already. Don't mess with us if you know what's good for you.
translation: 这水是非卖品。早就说过了。如果你识相点就不要惹我们。

original: I've got nothing to say to wastelander scum like you.
translation: 我跟你这种废土游民没话可说。

original: Please pardon our dust; we are currently experiencing maintenance issues within the Presidential Metro system.
translation: 请原谅这里尘埃遍地; 我们正在总统专用地铁内进行维修工作

original: If you require event information or directions, please speak to an information kiosk officer.
translation: 如想获取事件信息或方位，请询问信息处官员。

original: If you have any questions regarding the Presidential Metro, please speak to an information kiosk officer.
translation: 如有任何与总统专用地铁系统有关的问题，请询问信息处官员。

original: Move along please.
translation: 情走开。

original: Please note that the use of firearms within this facility is a direct violation of 17 federal laws. Have a good day.
translation: 请注意，在本设施内使用武力，将被视为违反第17好联邦法令。祝您愉快。

original: Please continue along. If you have any questions, seek an information kiosk officer at any one of the stations.
translation: 请通过。如有任何问题，请与站内信息处官员联系。

original: Interfering with a Presidential Metro Automated Unit is a crime. Please move along.
translation: 干扰总统专用地铁内自动化单位的工作，将被视为犯罪行为。清走开。

original: Have a good day, and thank you for riding the Presidential Metro.
translation: 欢迎乘坐总统专用地铁，祝您愉快。

original: This access point is now locked. Have a good day.
translation: 该进入点现已关闭。祝您愉快。

original: Scanning potential intruder... Senate Identification detected. Unlocking access point and logging identity in mainframe.
translation: 扫描潜在入侵者中……议员身份确认。正解锁进入点并登陆身份至主机。

original: How may I assist you today, Senator?
translation: 今天我能为您做些什么，议员？

original: This access point is no longer accessible. Have a good day.
translation: 该进入点现已不再可用。祝您愉快。

original: Welcome back, Senator. How may I assist you today?
translation: 欢迎回来，议员先生。今天我能为你做些什么？

original: Welcome back. How may I assist you today?
translation: 欢迎回来。今天我能为你做些什么？

original: America will never fall to Communist invasion.
translation: 美国不会被共党攻占的。

original: Death is a preferable alternative to Communism.
translation: 选择死亡也比选择共产主义更好。

original: Tactical assessment: Red Chinese victory... impossible.
translation: 作战评估: 中国红军胜利……不可能。

original: Freedom is the sovereign right of every American.
translation: 自由是每个美国人的权利。

original: Oh man, don't hurt me! I just work here!
translation: 噢老兄！别伤害我！我只是个在这儿干活的！

original: Oh, hey. You're back. Do you need anything else?
translation: 哦, 嗨。你回来了，你还需要什么吗？

original: What can I do for you?
translation: 我能为你做什么？

original: It's pretty busy down here right now, but I'll help if I can.
translation: 我现在非常忙，但我会尽力帮你的。

original: Did you need something?
translation: 你是不是需要些什么？

original: What do you need?
translation: 你需要什么？

original: Can I be of assistance?
translation: 我有什么能帮你的么？

original: If there's anything I can do to help, please just say so.
translation: 如果有什么我能帮到你的，请不要客气。

original: Did you need something?
translation: 你是不是需要些什么？

original: Good to see you.
translation: 很高兴见到你。

original: Things are as busy as ever. What do you need?
translation: 这儿总是很忙。你想要什么？

original: This really isn't the best time... Did you need something?
translation: 这真有点不是时候……你需要什么吗？

original: Ah yes, is there something you wished to discuss?
translation: 哦对了，你有什么想跟我商量吗？

original: Ha! I told those bastards you could do it!
translation: 哈！我告诉过那些混蛋你能做到的！

original: Oh, there were doubters inside the Citadel to be certain, but Lyons was behind you all the way and that was good enough for me.
translation: 哦，毫无疑问在五角大本营内仍有人对你抱有怀疑，但是里昂斯一直很支持你，而这对我来说已经足够。

original: I can't think of a better compliment but to simply say the Brotherhood would be almost nothing without you.
translation: 我实在不知道该如何表达我的感激之情， 我只能说如果没有你兄弟会将一事无成。

original: Thank you, from all of us.
translation: 我代表所有人，谢谢你。

original: Something else on your mind?
translation: 还有什么话要说？

original: When I first saw you long ago in that alley in Chevy Chase, I thought you were just some trashy Wastelander. I'm glad I was wrong.
translation: 回想不久前当我第一次在彻维彻斯的小路上看到你时，我还以为你是个一文不值的废土游民。但很高兴我错了。

original: My father thinks the world of you... and so do I. If things were different, maybe we could have had time to become friends...
translation: 我父亲很欣赏你……我也是。如果不是在这种环境下的话，也许我们能有时间交个朋友……

original: Anyway... I wish you the best of luck and I hope you stick around for a while. We need people like you to help us finish what we've started here!
translation: 不管怎么说啦……我还是希望你能平安无事，还有……我希望你能在这里多呆几天。我们需要你这样的人来帮助我们完成未尽的事业！

original: Hey there. What did you need?
translation: 嗨，你好。你需要点什么？

original: Well, I suppose we have you to thank for the sudden influx of equipment pouring in from the ruins you left behind at Adams Air Force Base.
translation: 怎么说呢，完全是多亏了你扫平了亚当空军基地，我们才能从那儿的废墟里源源不断地弄来这么多有用的设备 。

original: These items will help keep us one step ahead of our enemies in the Wasteland and hopefully start my reconstruction effort.
translation: 这些物资能够帮助我们在废土中保持对敌人的优势，与此同时还可让我开始重建计划

original: Mark my words, Prime will walk again. It may take months or even years, but we'll get him back together.
translation: 记住我的话吧，先锋一定会重新站起来的。这可能需要数月甚至数年，但是我们大家一定会把它修好的。

original: If you're inclined to help us with that effort, just let me know.
translation: 如果你想要帮我们干这个，尽管说。

original: Yes? I'm quite busy, so please be brief.
translation: 有事么？我很忙，所以请长话短说。

original: You did it! You actually did it!
translation: 你做到了！你真的做到了！

original: Do you have any idea how famous you're gonna be? You're being inscribed in all of our records as, well... as a hero!
translation: 你知不知道你将会变得多有名吗？我们已将你作为一个英雄载入我们的史册！

original: Hey, if there's anything you ever need, I'm your gal!
translation: 嘿，如果你需要什么，尽管说！

original: Hey! What's up?
translation: 嘿！怎么了？

original: I'm sorry, but I'm busy, okay?
translation: 我很抱歉，但是我现在很忙，好吗？

original: What should I do? He asked for water, and I thought I was helping him, not killing him!
translation: 我能做什么？他祈求给他一点水，而我觉得我是在帮他，而不是杀他！

original: I can't handle this. Just leave me alone.
translation: 这我管不了。请别来烦我。

original: Look, I didn't mean to kill him, okay?
translation: 听着，我没想杀了他，明白吗？

original: Walk in Atom's Holy Glow.
translation: 徜徉在原子的荣光下吧。

original: Weary traveler, welcome to the monastery of the Apostles of the Eternal Light.
translation: 疲惫的旅行者啊，欢迎来到永恒之光使徒们的修道院。

original: Oh, but you must be parched from your travels! Please, accept this gift: holy water, blessed by our order.
translation: 哦，但在长途跋涉后你一定口干舌燥了！请接受这份馈赠: 我主赐予我们的圣水。

original: We must drink deep of the Water of Light, so that it may sanctify our tongues, and render us purified for discourse!
translation: 我们应痛饮这圣光之水，这样可以洗净我们的喉舌，让我们能够表达纯洁的思想！

original: Ah, I can see the glint of Atom's Light in your eyes! You have purified your tongue with the holy water, so now we may speak.
translation: 啊，我看见了你眼中的原子之光在闪烁！你已用圣水洗净了你的喉舌，现在我们可以谈话了。

original: How may this servant of the Eternal Light serve you?
translation: 我这个永恒之光的仆人能为你做些什么呢？

original: You must cleanse your tongue of unseemly speech by drinking deep of the holy water. Then we may speak.
translation: 你必须用圣水清洗掉你口中的无礼言辞。之后我们才能开始谈话。

original: Cleanse your tongue with the holy water. For we must speak with seemly tongues when we make mention of Atom's Light.
translation: 用圣水洗净你的喉舌。因为在我们谈论原子之光的时候必须言辞得体。

original: May Atom light your path, traveler.
translation: 愿原子为你指引前路，旅行者。

original: Welcome to our monastery.
translation: 欢迎来到我们的修道院。

original: Oh, my! I wasn't expecting a pilgrim to our shrine! We're hardly prepared for casual visitors, I'm afraid.
translation: 哦，天哪！我真没想到会有朝圣者来到我们的圣地！我真担心我们会对突然到访的客人招呼不周啊。

original: You must have made quite an impression on Brother Gerard. He's a lovely boy, but rather strident. I hope he wasn't a bother.
translation: 我想你已经给杰拉德兄弟留下了深刻的印象。他蛮可爱的，就是太吵了。希望他没有打扰到你。

original: But where are my manners? I'm Mother Curie the Third, and I lead the Apostles of the Eternal Light. What can I do for you, my dear?
translation: 我竟然忘了我的礼仪？我是圣母居里三世，我负责领导永恒之光的使徒们。我能为你做些什么，亲爱的？

original: Oh, my! I wasn't expecting a pilgrim to our shrine! We're hardly prepared for visitors, I'm afraid.
translation: 哦，天哪！我真没想到会有朝圣者来到我们的圣地！我真担心我们会对突然到访的客人招呼不周啊。

original: And you didn't come here with peaceful intentions, did you? Oh, poor Brother Gerard. He was rather too strident, but he deserved better than that.
translation: 而你并非本着平和至善意前来的，不是吗？哦，可怜的杰拉德兄弟啊。他确实是个吵闹的人，那即便如此他也不该遭如此对待。

original: But that's no excuse for rudeness, now is it? I'm Mother Curie the Third, and I lead the Apostles of the Eternal Light. Why have you come to us?
translation: 但这并不能作为粗鲁的借口，不是吗？我是圣母居里三世，我负责领导永恒之光的使徒们。请问阁下来此地目的何在？

original: My Lord. I can not bear to look upon your shining face... I am unworthy...
translation: 我的主啊。我简直无法直视你那光芒万丈的脸庞……我不配……

original: We will spread our word without this holy water. The Light of Atom need not be spread through deceit.
translation: 我们将不会再用这圣水来传诵我们的教义。原子之光不需要靠欺诈来传播。

original: Yes, my child?
translation: 什么事，我的孩子？

original: Do you have something you wish to say?
translation: 你有什么想要说的么？

original: Our veins flow with Atom's Eternal Glow.
translation: 我们的血液中流淌着原子那永恒的光芒。

original: Grrrr...
<sniffing>
translation: 我真希望它们不会发觉我们现在在哪。如果它们抓住我们，我想不会只把我们扔回牢房了事。

original: Grrrrrloooow
translation: 咯……咯……（光辉）

original: <gurgle>
translation: <咯咯>

original: Arrrr-taaahm.
translation: 啊……特姆（原子）

original: Are you well, dear?
translation: 你还好吗，亲爱的？

original: The water she gave me... it... there's something... wrong...
translation: 她给我的水……里面……有点……不对…劲……

original: Arrrggghhhh!
translation: 啊呃呃呃！

original: We came to Megaton to preach of the Eternal Glow...
translation: 我们来到核弹镇是为了宣讲原子的光辉……

original: I saw Atom's Holy Light. I TOUCHED Atom himself! I felt his warm embrace!
translation: 我看到了原子的圣光。我亲手触摸得到了原子！我感受到了它的温暖！

original: Mother Curie she... she changed... I changed, too, but I'm still myself. Poor Mother Curie... she saw the face of Atom and it drove her mad.
translation: 圣母居里她……她变了……我也变了，但我仍是我自己。可怜的圣母居里……她看到了原子的真实面目，这令他疯了。

original: I don't know what to do! I think I'll stay here; pray to Atom. Pray for his guidance, for he has made me of the Eternal. The undying. I am his now.
translation: 我不知道该怎么办！我认为我要呆在这; 向原子祈祷。祈求它的指引，因为是他让我获得了永恒。如今我已经是永恒而不朽的了。我现在完全属于他。

original: I have been created anew by Atom's transmuting fire.
translation: 我已被原子的转生之火重新塑造了。

original: I must stay here. Pray and think. Think and pray. It will come to me. What must be done. Soon Atom will reveal his plan to me. Yes. Yes. Yeeeees!
translation: 我必须留在这里。祈祷和沉思。沉思和祈祷。它终将来到我面前。此乃我必须完成的使命。不就原子就将向我揭示它的宏伟蓝图。是的。是的。是—的—！

original: Atom in my head. Atom in my heart. Atom is in all things. Atom is all things. Atom... Atom... Atom...
translation: 原子在我身。原子在我心。原子在万事万物中。原子即是一切。原子……原子……原子……

original: Any progress on the Megaton situation?
translation: 核弹镇的情况有什么进展么？

original: Have you heard about that new cult? They took our water! Here, read this. It's one of their pamphlets.
translation: 你听说那所谓的新兴的邪教了么？他们抢走了我们的水！来，看看这个。这是他们的小册子。

original: I don't have your money yet. Once a week, remember?
translation: 我现在没钱给你。每周一次，记住了吗？

original: Come back in a few days.
translation: 过几天再来。

original: Oh, I hadn't seen you in so long. I thought you died. Um... I stopped setting aside money for you... um, here. Take this. It's all I have to spare.
translation: 噢，很久不见啊。我还以为你死啦。呃……所以我就没留你那份儿……嗯，给你。拿着这些。我只剩这些了。

original: Now get out of here before my customers take notice.
translation: 现在在我的顾客们发现之前快点离开吧。

original: You're really going to blackmail me? <sigh>
translation: 你真想敲诈我啊？<叹气>

original: Here. Take it. I'll see you next week. Now get out of here before my customers notice what's going on.
translation: 给你。拿着。下周再见。现在在我的顾客发现之前赶紧离开这里。

original: Is it that time already? Fine. Here's your money.
translation: 这么快就到日子了？好吧。这是你的钱。

original: Now get out of here. I'm trying to earn some money.
translation: 现在快离开吧。我正在拼命挣钱呢。

original: I believe our business is concluded, friend.
translation: 我认为我们的买卖已经结束了，朋友。

original: See here folks: another happy customer. A great day to you, too, sir! Thank you for stopping by!
translation: 看看吧乡亲们: 又有一位顾客满意而归啦。这位先生，同样地，祝您愉快，！感谢您的光临！

original: I believe our business is concluded, friend.
translation: 我认为我们的买卖已经结束了，朋友。

original: See here folks: another happy customer. A great day to you, too, ma'am! Thank you for stopping by!
translation: 看看吧乡亲们: 又有一位顾客满意而归啦。这位美女，同样地，祝您愉快，！感谢您的光临！

original: Well, hello there Smoothskin! Step right up. Have you come to savor the great taste of the Amazing Aqua Cura?
translation: 哇哦，你好光皮肤的！上这儿来。请问你品尝过沌浄水那美妙绝伦的滋味了吗？

original: Did you manage to scrounge up the 10 caps? It's a small price indeed for the Amazing Aqua Cura!
translation: 手头有10个瓶盖吗？对于神奇的沌浄水来说这实在是太便宜了！

original: Welcome back! I trust you've changed your mind and have come for your very own bottle of the Amazing Aqua Cura?
translation: 欢迎回来！我就知道你改变主意啦，想给自己买上一瓶神奇的沌浄水？

original: Ah, I hope there's nothing wrong with your Aqua Cura. Remember, all sales are final... um, now how can I help you, dear returning customer of mine?
translation: 啊，希望你的沌浄水没什么问题。记住，一经售出概不退货……嗯，那么我能帮你什么忙吗，我亲爱的常客？

original: Welcome back. What can I do for you?
translation: 欢迎你回来。我能为你做什么？

original: He lied to us.
translation: 他对我撒了谎。

original: He got exactly what he deserved.
translation: 他绝对是罪有应得。

original: Can't sucker anyone else now, can he?
translation: 再也不能对任何人摇尾乞怜了，不是吗？

original: I believed his lies... but now he's dead.
translation: 我曾经相信过他的谎言……但现在他死了。

original: I can't believe it.
translation: 我真的无法相信。

original: I don't know what to say.
translation: 我不知道该说什么。

original: Little busy at the moment, smoothskin.
translation: 我现在有点忙，光皮肤的。

original: Shhh!
translation: 嘘！

original: They came out of nowhere. I need to get back to report to Lepelletier. She'll want to know what happened. Thanks for the help!
translation: 他们来路不明。我得赶回去向莱佩莱捷报告。她一定想知道发生了什么事。谢谢你的帮助！

original: I warned you not to come around. I will not be extorted.
translation: 我警告过你不要回来的。我不吃这套。

original: Quit wasting my time. If you're here to help with the caravan, great. Otherwise, get out of here before I have you arrested.
translation: 别再浪费我的时间了。如果你是来帮助商队的，那很好。否则，在我把你给抓起来之前滚蛋。

original: I'm not interested in playing games with you. So unless you're here to offer a hand: GO - A - WAY!
translation: 我没兴趣跟你玩。所以如果你不是来帮忙的: 给- 我 - 滚！

original: Look buddy, I'm a very busy woman. I don't have time for your bullshit. I'm busy coordinating a military operation here. So if you don't mind?
translation: 听着伙计，我很忙。我没工夫听你那些废话。所以如果你不介意的话？我正忙着领导一次军事行动。

original: Look missy, I'm a very busy woman. I don't have time for your bullshit. I'm busy coordinating a military operation here. So if you don't mind?
translation: 听着小姐，我很忙。我没工夫听你那些废话。所以如果你不介意的话，我正忙着调节一次军事行动。

original: If you're here looking for water, I'm afraid I can't help you.
translation: 如果你是来这儿找水的话，我恐怕帮不了你。

original: All the water is at Project Purity. If you want a hand out, head over to the Jefferson Memorial and ask for Scribe Bigsley.
translation: 所有的水都在净水工程那儿。如果你想要水，去杰斐逊纪念馆找比格斯利文员。

original: Now, if you'll excuse me, I'm busy coordinating military operations.
translation: 现在，如果你不介意的话，我正忙着调节一次军事行动。

original: I have nothing to give you. Go speak with Bigsley at Project Purity if you need a reward.
translation: 我没有东西可给你。如果你想要奖赏去跟净水工程的比格斯利谈谈。

original: Well, did you take care of whoever's behind the attacks on the caravans?
translation: 那么，你搞定来袭击商队的幕后真凶了吗？

original: Well, did you find out who's behind the attacks on the caravans?
translation: 那么，你查到到底是谁在幕后指使袭击商队了吗？

original: Shouldn't you be out there, dealing with the attacks on the caravans?
translation: 你现在是不是应该在外面，处理针对商队的袭击事件啊？

original: Damnit, I'm too pissed to talk now. Got to blow off some steam.
translation: 该死，我现在气得都说不出话来了。我得放松放松。

original: Damnit boy! Like I told you, just one rule: "Do what the hell I say." We're a gang. We all wear Metal Armor. So put it on already.
translation: 该死的，小子！我跟你说过，只有一条规矩 "我说什么，你就他妈的做什么。"我们是一个帮派。我们都穿金属装甲。所以赶紧给我把它穿上。

original: Damnit girl! Like I told you, just one rule: "Do what the hell I say." We're a gang. We all wear Metal Armor. So put it on already.
translation: 该死的，小妞！我跟你说过，只有一条规矩 "我说什么，你就他妈的做什么。"我们是一个帮派。我们都穿金属装甲。所以赶紧给我把它穿上。

original: What is it? Take a seat and relax already. You're making me nervous.
translation: 这是什么？快坐下放松，你搞的我很紧张。

original: You're one of the new recruits, eh? And look at that. Already wearing the gang uniform.
translation: 你是个新兵，是吗？快看看那边那个。已经穿上了帮派的统一制服了。

original: You best know the pass phrase though, or you're dead.
translation: 你最好知道通行口令，否则你就死定了。

original: Who the hell are you?
translation: 你到底是谁？

original: Killed the boss fair an' square. Good job kid. Normally that'd make you the new boss, but we're all tired of bosses.
translation: 光明正大地杀掉了老板。干的好孩子。按理说你现在是新老板了，但是我们现在已经受够了老板什么的了。

original: But, we liked Split Jack's plan. So if you can get that bitch at Rivet City to buy into our "protection services" we'll split the take with ya.
translation: 但是，我们觉得斯普利特·杰克的计划不错。所以如果你能让铆钉城那个婊子继续购买我们的"安全服务"的话，我们就算你一份。

original: So we don't need ya to be our leader. But we will cut you in on the protection racket. IF you can get Lepelletier to sign on.
translation: 所以我们不需要你当我们的老板。但是如果你能让莱佩莱捷签合同的话，我们会算你一份。

original: We got nothing to talk about until you've gotten Lepelletier to give us the protection contract. Now, git!
translation: 在你从莱佩莱捷那儿给我们争取来安保合同之前，我们没什么好谈的。现在，滚吧白痴！

original: Another new recruit? Quit bothering me. Talk to the boss. Split Jack.
translation: 又是一个新兵？别来烦我。去跟老板说。他是斯普利特·杰克。

original: Get out of my face.
translation: 从我眼前消失。

original: If you're looking for Davis and Lorin, they're already on their way north. Follow the River from Project Purity.
translation: 如果你在找大卫和洛林，他们早已向北走了。沿着Project Purity的这条河走。

original: Got to hand it to you kid. That was a brave thing you did, risking your life to start the Purifier.
translation: 该把这个给你。你很勇敢，你冒着生命危险启动了净化器。

original: But, do you know you've made my life a living hell? I'm guessing not.
translation: 但是，你知道你把我的生活搞得一团糟了吗？我猜你不知道。

original: The hero of the Wasteland probably has more important things to worry about.  Don't you?
translation: 看来我们的废土英雄还有更重要的是要担心。 不是吗？

original: Can't say I blame you kid-o. I wouldn't have risked it either. That Sarah on the other hand, she's got a bleeding heart like her old man.
translation: 到不能说我是在埋怨你。换作是我我也不会冒险。但是莎拉就不同了，他跟他家老爷子一样是个软心肠。

original: Oh, and bravo for giving her that code to the Purifer. Since then, my life's been a living hell.
translation: 噢，还给了她净化器的密码，。从那之后，我的生活就乱了套了。

original: And I have YOU to thank for that.
translation: 而这一切都是拜你所赐。

original: Did Lyons give you a little congratulatory speech? Then, you won't mind if I don't offer you one.
translation: 里昂斯对你宣读什么感谢致辞了吗？那么，如果我不那么做你不会介意吧。

original: Thanks to you and that little friend of yours cranking up the Purifier, my life's become a living hell.
translation: 多亏了你和你那小朋友启动了净化器啊，我的生活现在简直成了个地狱。

original: But the heroes of the Wasteland probably don't care about THAT.
translation: 但是咱们废土的大英雄好像不会在乎这些。

original: Did Lyons give you a little congratulatory speech? Then, you won't mind if I don't offer you one.
translation: 里昂斯对你宣读什么感谢致辞了吗？那么，如果我不那么做你不会介意吧。

original: Thanks to you helping get the Purifier up and running, my life's become a living hell.
translation: 多谢你帮助启动了净水器，我的生活现在变得活像个地狱。

original: But you probably don't care about THAT.
translation: 但是你应该不会关心这等闲事吧。

original: Look, kid. I really don't have time for your games. If you're here to help, great. If not, then I really need you to find someone else to pester.
translation: 听着，孩子。我真的没空跟你玩。如果你是来这儿帮忙的，很好。如果不是，那我真的希望你另找个人去烦。

original: What?! I've got a bagillion things to deal with at the moment, and wasting my time with you is not one of them.
translation: 什么？！我还有一堆一堆的重要事情要处理呢，而跟你在这儿闲扯可不在此列。

original: Is there something else?
translation: 还有什么事吗？

original: There isn't someone else you could bother?
translation: 你就不可以去烦其他人吗？

original: What is it this time?
translation: 这次又是怎么了？

original: Yes?
translation: 是的？

original: Don't bother Bigsley. He's not having a very good day.
translation: 别去劳烦比格斯利了。他今天过得不怎么样。

original: <Sigh>
translation: <叹息>

original: If it's not one thing, it's another. Well, got to run.
translation: 如果不是这一件事，就是另一件事。总之，得走了。

original: This water delivery business is a complex affair.
translation: 这运水生意可是个复杂的买卖。

original: So much to do, so little time to do it.
translation: 事儿太多，时间又太少。

original: No use talking to me. No use talking to the boss either. Oh well. Guess you're out of luck.
translation: 跟我说没用。跟老板说也没用。好吧。看上去你运气不佳。

original: I'm so glad I got drafted to be part of Lyons' little Water Delivery Team. No really, I can't tell you what a wonderful opportunity this all is.
translation: 我非常“荣幸”能成为里昂斯的运水队伍的一员。不仅如此，我都没法跟你形容这是多么千载难逢的“大好机会”。

original: I'd stay away from the boss. He's in one of his moods again.
translation: 我得离老板远点。他看上去又不爽了。

original: Hey, good to see you! I heard you had a bit of a problem getting the purifier started... Sorry about that. We're looking into exactly what happened.
translation: 嘿，很高兴见到你！我听说你在启动净化器遇到了点麻烦……深表同情。我们正调查到底发生了什么事。

original: Anyway, it's great to see you on your feet again. We wouldn't be here now without you!
translation: 不管怎么说，看到你能康复可真好。如果不是你我们此刻就不会站在了里了！

original: If there's anything you need, just let me know.
translation: 如果有什么需要，尽管说。

original: Just can't stay away, can you?
translation: 你就离我远一点，行不行？

original: Well, I guess it's good you're not dead. And I guess I should say thanks for getting us running.
translation: 好吧，我想看到你没死我该高兴。而且我想我该谢谢你帮了我们大忙。

original: Look, I'm busy. Can we do this some other time?
translation: 听着，我现在很忙。我们能不能等会儿再管它？

original: Sorry, can't stop to chat.
translation: 对不起，实在没有时间停下来聊天。

original: Since Dr. Li left, we've all had so much more to do. Who knew she did so much?!
translation: 自从李博士走了以后，我们总是有太多工作要做。这之前谁意识到她如此不可或缺？！

original: I wish those Scribes would leave us alone. They just get in the way.
translation: 我希望那些文员们别来烦我们。他们一直在帮倒忙。

original: Bigsley's making this more complicated than it needs to be.
translation: 比格斯利把一切搞得越来越复杂了。

original: So much to do... so much to do...
translation: 太忙了……太忙了……

original: A yup. We'll get on outa here soon as we're done drinking up this free booze. Driving water is dangerous. Want to get liquored up first. Ahaha.
translation: 对头。等我们喝完了我们就上路。运水可是很危险的。上路之前怎么也得来个一醉方休啊。啊哈哈哈哈。

original: Can't beat free booze. I was gonna drive my Brahmin up that way anyway. That Rivet City chick's giving me an escort to boot!
translation: 谁能拒绝免费畅饮呢。反正我都要带着我的双头牛上路的。而且那个铆钉城的鸡崽子托我护送一批货！

original: Heard more than a few of these water caravans go missing.
translation: 听说有不少这样的运水商队都有去无回了。

original: Once we exhaust this supply of free beer, then we'll get going.
translation: 等我们喝完了这些啤酒，我们就走。

original: Hope those security guards know what they're doing. The last group to leave here seemed a little young to be guarding anything.
translation: 希望那些保安知道他们在做什么。最后要离开的那一批人年纪有点小，真的很难胜任护卫的。

original: Sit down. Grab a beer. It's free!
translation: 请坐。来瓶啤酒。免费的！

original: This access point is no longer accessible. Have a good day.
translation: 此进入点已不再可用。祝你愉快。

original: This access point is now locked. Have a good day.
translation: 此进入点现已关闭。祝你愉快。

original: Any last minute questions?
translation: 还有什么问题吗？

original: How may I assist you today, Senator?
translation: 今天有什么需要帮忙的吗，议员先生？

original: Scanning potential intruder... Senate Identification detected. Unlocking access point and logging identity in mainframe.
translation: 正在扫描潜在入侵者……议员身份确认。正进行进入点解锁，并将身份登入主机。

original: How may I assist you today, Senator?
translation: 今天需要什么帮助么，议员先生？

original: This access point is now locked. Have a good day.
translation: 该进入点现已关闭。祝你愉快。

original: This access point is no longer accessible. Have a good day.
translation: 该进入点已不再可用。祝你愉快。

original: Welcome back, Senator. How may I assist you today?
translation: 欢迎回来，议员先生。我今天能为你做点什么？

original: Welcome back. How may I assist you today?
translation: 欢迎回来。我今天能为你做点什么？

original: Warning, due to a major security breach, this system is on code red alert status. Prepare for security check.
translation: 警告，由于重大安保侵犯，该系统已进入红色预警状态。准备进行安全检查。

original: Attempting to identify local access user... Identification failed.
translation: 正尝试确认内部进入用户中……确认失败。

original: This access point is restricted only to authorized personnel. Please identify yourself.
translation: 该进入点仅限于获得授权者。请验证身份。

original: What the hell? The whole place... it's... it's gone!
translation: 这他妈的怎么回事？这儿整个地方……全……全完了！

original: It was you... you did this! You goddamn murderer! You've killed them all!
translation: 是你……是你干的！你这可恶的凶手！你把他们都杀了！

original: Kill this traitor! Kill him!
translation: 杀了这叛徒！杀了他！

original: When I first met you some time ago, I was leery of your motivations and even more concerned with your methods.
translation: 从我第一次见到你起，我就怀疑你的动机还有你的行事作风。

original: At the battle for Project Purity, you proved yourself... and any doubt that I had about you dissipated on that day.
translation: 在净水工程争夺战中，你证明了你自己……而我对你的所有怀疑都在那天烟消云散了。

original: Now, with the Enclave in ruins and with you to thank for it, I'm almost at a complete loss for words.
translation: 如今，英克雷已覆灭，我们也要感谢你为我们所作的一切。然而此刻我却不知道该说什么好。

original: I feel proud to call you one of our own, and I promise that what you've done here today will be recorded by our scribes as a historic moment.
translation: 把你当成我们中的一员我感到十分骄傲，而我向你保证你今天所做的一切将会被我们的文员们作为一件重大的历史时刻而记录下来。

original: On behalf of the Brotherhood of Steel and on behalf of the free people of this Wasteland, I thank you.
translation: 我代表钢铁兄弟会，代表生活在这片废土上的人民，感谢你。

original: Come on, soldier. Move like you've got a purpose and get aboard!
translation: 动作快，士兵们。雷厉风行，马上登机！

original: Move, move. Get on the Vertibird!
translation: 快，快。快上飞鸟！

original: Surprised to see me?
translation: 看到我很意外？

original: I hope you're ready for your next assignment.
translation: 我想你已经准备好接下一趟活了。

original: You found a Tesla Coil?
translation: 你找到了一个特斯拉线圈？

original: Excellent. I'll see to it that this reaches the scribes immediately.
translation: 好极了。我会确保它立即被送达文员那。

original: You've done good work, soldier.
translation: 你干得很好，士兵。

original: Are you ready for your next assignment? We don't have time to spare.
translation: 你准备好接受下一个任务了么？我们时间紧迫。

original: If we're going to have any chance of taking down their vertibirds, we need a Tesla Coil. Report back immediately if you locate one.
translation: 若我们想要在对付飞鸟的时候取得优势，那我们就需要一个特斯拉线圈。如果你找到的话立刻向我报告。

original: Nice work back there. Let's hope the scribes can do something useful with the information you retrieved.
translation: 干得漂亮。真希望文员们能用得上你带回来的这些宝贵的信息。

original: Unfortunately, we don't have time to sit around and wait for the analysis.
translation: 很遗憾，我们没时间悠闲的坐在这里等分析结果。

original: Based on what I've seen of you so far, there's an assignment I believe you're well suited for.
translation: 介于迄今为止你的表现，我这里有份我认为非常适合你的工作。

original: In the interest of time, we'll skip the congratulations and get to work.
translation: 时间关系，我们还是省掉庆祝继续工作吧。

original: You've gotten yourself through some pretty rough spots before, and I'm hoping you can do it again.
translation: 你已经完成了一系列艰巨的任务，我希望你能再帮一次忙。

original: I requested you specifically for this assignment. I think you're well suited for it, and I need someone I can count on.
translation: 我特别指定你来完成这个任务。我认为你是非常合适的人选，而我需要一个能靠得住的人。

original: If we're going to have any chance of taking down their vertibirds, we need a Tesla Coil. Report back immediately if you locate one.
translation: 若我们想要在对付飞鸟的时候取得优势，那我们就需要一个特斯拉线圈。如果你找到的话立刻向我报告。

original: Hey, talk to Wint, okay? I'm just following his lead.
translation: 嘿，去跟温特谈，行吗？我只是服从他的命令。

original: I'm not even supposed to be here! Just talk to Wint.
translation: 我压根就不该在这儿！去跟温特谈。

original: I just want to get out of here. You feel like chatting, you talk to Wint.
translation: 我只想离开这儿。你想聊天，找温特聊去。

original: What the...?
translation: 这他妈……？

original: How the hell'd you get in here, smoothskin?
translation: 你他妈的是怎么进来的，光皮肤的？

original: See you around, kid.
translation: 再会了，小子。

original: I hope the scrambler is useful for you. If not, I hope you can run very, very fast.
translation: 我希望这个扰频器能够起作用。否则的话，我希望你能跑得很快，很快。

original: I'm still very, very busy. Is this important, or can it wait?
translation: 我仍然非常，非常忙。这事儿很重要吗，等一下好吗？

original: Hey, you're awake! All right! Paladin Tristan is just inside. He's waiting for you.
translation: 嗨，你醒了！太好了！特里斯坦圣骑士就在里面。他在等你。

original: Head on in. Tristan is waiting for you.
translation: 快请进。特里斯坦正在等你。

original: I'm sorry, I'm very busy right now. Far too much to analyze. Perhaps one of the other Scribes could help you?
translation: 我很抱歉，我现在很忙。还有很多东西要分析。也许其他的文员可以帮助你？

original: Please, speak with Elder Lyons. I have enough to deal with right now.
translation: 对不起，有事请找里昂斯长老。我现在够忙的了。

original: Well, well. Look who's back amongst the living.
translation: 好啊，好啊。看看这是谁啊，终于没事啦。

original: Some of us were starting to wonder if you and Sarah were going to pull through.
translation: 我们还在想你和Sarah到底能不能康复呢。

original: Well, well. Look who's back amongst the living.
translation: 好啊，好啊。看看这是谁啊，终于没事啦。

original: Didn't expect to see you. After dragging your ass back to the Citadel, I thought you might be comatose forever.
translation: 真没想到还能再看到你。在把你拖回五角大本营后，我还以为你会永远昏迷不醒呢。

original: Kind of surprising that you managed to survive, but with all her training, Sarah didn't.
translation: 看到你能活过来真有点惊讶，但是尽管受过专业训练，莎拉还仍在昏迷当中。

original: Tell me you've got something, anything we can use.
translation: 你一定知道些什么，有什么我们可以用得上的。

original: Unless you've got something, get inside there and get me some information! We need to know what the hell they just pulled on us!
translation: 除非你还有什么有用的消息，不然回去给我挖些有用的信息出来！我们需要知道我们到底他妈的遇到什么鬼事儿了！

original: We need to find out what the hell just happened.
translation: 我们需要弄明白到底他妈的发生什么事了。

original: There's no time to talk - get your ass inside that base, and help the troops locate the source of their transmission. Now solider, NOW!
translation: 没时间闲聊了 - 给我到那个基地去，帮部队找到他们的信号源的所在。现在，士兵。开始行动！

original: What the hell...
translation: 这他妈的……

original: I trust you've spoken with Rothchild? I hope he can make some headway with the data you recovered.
translation: 我相信你跟罗斯查德谈过？我希望他能从你收到的数据中获得些许进展。

original: With our primary weapon destroyed, we risk losing our momentum and jeopardizing the entire campaign.
translation: 因为我们的主要武器被毁了，这使得我们正在失去大好的局势，甚至有可能危及整个战役。

original: I must admit, I now wonder whether moving ahead with this operation was an error in judgment.
translation: 我必须承认，我现在开始怀疑这一行动是不是判断有误。

original: Paladin Tristan sent word that you'd be returning with something useful for us. Please, find Scribe Rothchild before you do anything else.
translation: 特里斯坦圣骑士说你会带回来对我们有利用价值的东西。请马上去和文员罗斯查德谈谈。

original: I'd hoped that you would be off assisting Paladin Tristan. What do you need?
translation: 我希望你最好去帮助下特里斯坦圣骑士。你需要什么？

original: If you haven't yet done so, please see Rothchild soon.
translation: 如果你还没去见罗斯查德，现在请快去。

original: Careful now, careful. Don't move too quickly. Everything's fine. You're safe... You're in the Citadel.
translation: 现在当心，当心。别走得太快。一切都好。你现在很安全……你现在在五角大本营。

original: I was starting to think you might never wake up, despite assurances to the contrary.
translation: 我都开始以为你再也醒不过来了，尽管人们都说不会的。

original: I've been coming down here every day to see both you and my daughter. It's good that at least one of you has recovered.
translation: 我几乎每天都过来探望你和我的女儿。令人感到欣慰的是你们中的一人终于康复了。

original: Easy now, take it slow. Don't move too quickly. It's all right, you're in the Citadel now. Relax.
translation: 放轻松，慢点。别走得太快。一切都过去了，你现在已经在五角大本营了。放松。

original: I was starting to think you might never wake up, despite assurances to the contrary.
translation: 我都开始以为你再也醒不过来了，尽管人们都说不会的。

original: It's good to see you on your feet again.
translation: 看到你能康复可真高兴。

original: Good to see you. We can use all the help we can get.
translation: 很高兴见到你。我们可以利用任何可能的援助。

original: Glad to see you're back on your feet.
translation: 很高兴看到你康复了。

original: Let's hope this goes as smoothly as the last few operations.
translation: 让我们祈祷这次的实验和以前的几次一样顺利吧。

original: Don't worry. Tristan's done a great job so far.
translation: 别担心。目前为止特雷斯坦做得很好。

original: Okay, let's keep this tin can rolling. Fire support, people! Stay on it!
translation: 好的，让这铁家伙狂飙起来。火力支援，所有人！注意啦！

original: Keep your eyes on the robot! Take out anything it doesn't!
translation: 睁大眼睛关照下机器人！有什么它没打着的就帮它给清理掉！

original: Prime will do most of the heavy work. Just don't get in his way.
translation: 先锋 会顶在前面。别挡它的道就行了。

original: Let's hope whatever the hell that is, it's actually useful.
translation: 不管那是什么东西，但愿它能真正派上用场。

original: The Scribes need to see what you've got. Get back to the Citadel.
translation: 文员们得看看你搞到了什么。把它带回五角大本营去。

original: Get that data back to the Citadel now!
translation: 现在，赶紧带着那数据回五角大本营！

original: Don't interrupt my flow here. Just pay attention.
translation: 别在打乱我的节奏。你保持警惕就行了。

original: I just... I can't believe it. All those years of work. All of it, for what? One botched operation?
translation: 我只是……我不敢相信。这么多年来的付出。所有的一切，都是为了什么？就这么一场搞砸了的行动？

original: I'm still waiting on the debriefing from Tristan, but I'm not sure it even matters. With Prime gone...
translation: 我还在等特雷斯坦的任务简报，我都不知道还等它干嘛。先锋都不在了……

original: I'm gonna burn every one of these devil-headed bastards to the ground for what they did to Liberty Prime!
translation: 我要把这帮邪恶的渣滓烧成灰烬，一个不留以报“自由先锋”被毁之仇！

original: You just find something we can use. I'll take care of the rest.
translation: 你只需要找些我们能用的东西。剩下的我来解决。

original: They knew we were coming.... How did they know we were coming?
translation: 他们知道我们要来了……。可他们是怎么知道的？

original: You see anything? There's got to be something in here we can take back to the Citadel.
translation: 你发现什么了吗？这儿肯定有什么东西值得我们带回五角大本营的。

original: We've got to find out what they just attacked us with. Keep your eyes peeled.
translation: 我们必须弄清楚他们刚刚是用什么攻击我们的。给我把眼睛睁大点了。

original: Watch yourself in here. Who knows what they're gonna throw at us next.
translation: 保持警惕。天知道他们还会用什么来对付我们。

original: Right in front of the map, if you please. I'd like you to get a good look at it.
translation: 就在地图的前面，如果你不介意的话，我想让你好好看看。

original: Well, it's good to see that you're on your feet again.
translation: 嗯哼，看到你终于康复了可真好。

original: I assume Lyons is immediately throwing you to the wolves?
translation: 我觉得里昂斯是在把你往火坑里推？

original: Has he told you what's been going on while you've been resting?
translation: 他告诉你在你昏迷这段时间都发生什么事了吗？

original: If there's anything else you'd like to know, I'll tell you what I can. Otherwise, Paladin Tristan will be waiting.
translation: 如果还有什么你想知道的，我知道的话一定会告诉你的。没事的话， 特里斯坦圣骑士正在等着你呢。

original: I'll alert him that you're on your way.
translation: 我会通知他你已经在路上了。

original: Hey, it's you!
translation: 嘿，是你！

original: Paladin Tristan is just inside. You should report to him right away; he's been waiting for you.
translation: 特里斯坦圣骑士就在里面。你最好现在就向他报告; 他正等着你呢。

original: If you're going to have him start the purifier, hurry up.
translation: 如果你想让他启动净水器，那就快点。

original: This better work...
translation: 他能干得更好...

original: <Cough.>
translation: <咳嗽。>

original: Aaaaggghhh.
translation: 啊啊啊啊。

original: It hurts... burns... inside... all over...
translation: 好痛……像火烧……在身体里……到处……

original: I can't... breathe... right... my chest... huuuuurts.
translation: 我不能……呼吸……在……胸口……痛……。

original: What's happening... to me. <Cough.>
translation: 我这是……怎么了。<咳嗽。>

original: Doc Barrows says I'm crazy, but I think it's that damn Aqua Cura making everybody sick. Myself, I ain't touching the stuff again.
translation: 巴罗斯医生说我疯了，但我觉得就是那该死的沌浄水让大家都病了。我绝对不会再碰那玩意了。

original: You may want to clear out of Megaton if you can. Lots of folks in town are sick, and nobody knows what's causing it.
translation: 你最好离核弹镇远点。镇上很多人都病了，没人知道是怎么回事。

original: Backstabbed us and sold us out, did ya?
translation: 陷害我们，把我们全都出卖了，是不是？

original: You're gonna pay for that.
translation: 你会为此付出代价的。

original: Backstabbed us and pocketed the money yourself, did ya?
translation: 陷害我们还把钱独吞了，是不是？

original: You're gonna pay for that.
translation: 你会为此付出代价的。

original: What? We thought you died or something. You haven't been around in so long... we divvied up your cut already.
translation: 什么？我们还以为你八成是死了呢。你很久没到这来了……我们早把你那份儿给分摊了。

original: Ah, sorry 'bout that. We'll start holding your cut for you again. But you got to come see us at least once a month. Or we'll assume your dead.
translation: 啊，对此我很抱歉。我们会重新替你存着你的那份。但是你必须至少每月来取一次。不然我们就会当是你已经挂了。

original: You're here for your cut?
translation: 你来这要你的那份？

original: Here ya go. Don't spend it all in one place.
translation: 给你，别一次花个精光了。

original: It ain't time to cut you in yet. We're still collecting the caps. Come back in a few days.
translation: 现在还不是拿你那份的时候。我们还在筹钱呢。过几天再来。

original: I warned you not to come around. I will not be extorted.
translation: 我警告过你不要再来了。我可不是个任人敲诈的软柿子。

original: You've helped me so much, it seems wrong to ask, but can you spare any more water?
translation: 你帮了我这么多，这样要求似乎不太对，但你能再给我点水吗？

original: I'll never forget you. Thank you for your help.
translation: 我永远不会忘记你的，感谢你的帮助。

original: I hate to ask but... do you have any more water?
translation: 我不想问，但...你还有水吗？

original: You've saved my life. Thank you, stranger. I hate to ask you this, but times are hard...
translation: 你救了我的命，谢谢你，陌生人。我很不想问你这个，但时局艰难...

original: Can you spare any more water?
translation: 你还能腾出更多的水吗？

original: Well, so much for celebrating.
translation: 庆典结束了。

original: One of us is going to have to go in there and turn the damned thing on. And whoever does it isn't coming back out.
translation: 我们其中一人必须进去打开那该死的东西。无论是谁，必定有去无回。

original: Not exactly how I imagined going out, you know?
translation: 其实我可不是这么想的，你懂吗？

original: So, what should we do? Draw straws?
translation: 那，我们应该怎么办？抽签？

original: You're reporting to Sarah from here on out. Don't let her down.
translation: 从现在起你向萨拉报告，别让她失望。

original: Get that airlock cycled, soldier, before we're all blown to kingdom come!
translation: 在我们被炸上天国之前，士兵，切换空气联锁阀。

original: So this is it? You just quit, give up on Uncle Sam and America? You make me puke.
translation: 所以就这样了？你就这么退出了，放弃了山姆大叔和美国？你真令我作呕。

original: This is where the hard decisions are made, soldier. Where history is written.
translation: 这是一个该做出艰难抉择的时刻，这一刻将载入史册，士兵。

original: If you don't cycle the airlock, I can't start the purifier.
translation: 你若不切换空气联锁阀我就无法启动净水器。

original: This is an unpleasant situation to find ourselves in.
translation: 我们的情形真令人不愉快。

original: I find your refusal to act to be in conflict with my sense of self-preservation.
translation: 我觉得你拒绝采取行动和我的自我保护的感觉相冲突。

original: Hurry and cycle the airlock, so I can start the purifier!
translation: 我要把净水机打开了,你快点把空气阀关掉!

original: This is a dire predicament. What shall we do?
translation: 这是一个可怕的困境。我们应该做什么？

original: Don't you think someone should start the purifier, after coming all this way? Letting ourselves be blown up seems... Irrational.
translation: 都走到这一步，你不觉得该有个人去启动净水器？让我们被崩飞这.... 没什么道理。

original: I suppose this is goodbye, friend.
translation: 我想我们应该说再见了,朋友

original: This appears to be the point where we part ways.
translation: 看来我们在这点有些分歧。

original: You've got a job to do, soldier. No time for chit-chat!
translation: 干你的活去。没时间闲聊！

original: The time for talk is over. Now, you must act. Go to the purifier. Make your father proud!
translation: 谈话时间结束。现在，你必须行动。去找净化器。让你父亲为你自豪！

original: For Elder Lyons!
translation: 为了里昂斯长老！

original: Good luck!
translation: 好运。 !

original: Project Purity is as good as ours!
translation: 净水工程已经是我们的了！

original: Welcome to the Citadel. Just remember -- you're a guest in our home. I expect you to behave yourself.
translation: 欢迎来到五角大本营。请记住 — 你是我们的客人。我希望你遵守规矩。

original: Glad to see you and that egghead Li made it here in one piece. I heard what happened at that purifier. Hell of thing.
translation: 很高兴见到你和书呆子李安全到了这。我听说净化器那的事。真是见鬼。

original: Hrm? Yes, hello. I've heard about you. We don't get many strangers here in the Citadel, especially those who walk about unescorted.
translation: 嗯？啊，你好。我听说过你。我们五角大本营没什么陌生人，特别是那些没护卫到处走的人。

original: I am Scribe Bowditch. If you require something, simply ask.
translation: 我是文员鲍蒂奇。如果你要什么，就请说。

original: "Knowledge is the beginning of wisdom, not the end of it." One of my favorite quotes. Its author has been lost to us.
translation: “知识是智慧的开始，而不是结束。”这是我最喜欢的引述。其作者已经无从考证。

original: How can I help you, outsider?
translation: 有什么可以帮助你的，外来者？

original: What do you want, outsider?
translation: 你想要什么，外来者？

original: Uhm... I don't think that Paladin Gunny would be very happy if he saw me talking to an outsider.
translation: 嗯……我不觉得圣骑士甘尼看见我和外来人说话会很高兴。

original: Stand down, civilian.
translation: 退下，平民。

original: Name's Paladin Bael. What do you need, civilian?
translation: 我是圣骑士贝尔。你需要什么，平民？

original: What aid can I offer you, outsider?
translation: 我能提供你什么帮助，外来人？

original: Shh. Not too loud. I don't really want people to know that we're doin' business.
translation: 嘘。轻点。我可不想让别人知道我们在做交易。

original: There rest of these guys around here might not want anything to do with you, but I got no problem with you... well, not with your caps at least.
translation: 其余那些家伙或许不愿和你打交道，但我可不介意……至少不介意和你的钱打交道。

original: Hey, good to see you again. What do you need?
translation: 嗨，很高兴见到你！需要些什么？

original: I'm not in the mood for you, asshole.
translation: 没心情搭理你，你这混蛋！

original: Pardon the mess.
translation: 乱七八糟的，请原谅。

original: I really need to clean this place up.
translation: 我真该把这地方打扫一下了。

original: Damn. I hope I can find that again.
translation: 该死。但愿我能再找到它。

original: Woops.
translation: 哇哦。

original: HELLO
translation: 你好。

original: What?
translation: 什么？

original: You got a problem?
translation: 你有问题吗？

original: What are you looking at?
translation: 你在看什么？

original: Stay away from me! I don't want whatever you smoothskins are infecting us with!
translation: 离我远点！我不想被你们光皮肤给传染了！

original: The one advantage of being a Ghoul was never getting sick. I guess they've taken that away from us too.
translation: 作为僵尸的一个好处就是从来不会生病。就连这点好处他们也要从我们身上剥夺走。

original: Have you seen the Chop Shop? Full of sick Ghouls... I wonder who's next?
translation: 你看见排骨店了吗？全都是生病的僵尸……我不知道下一个会是谁？

original: No offense, but I don't want whatever's going around. So just keep your distance, okay?
translation: 没有冒犯你的意思，但是我不想让任何人靠近。所以请保持你的距离,好吗？

original: I thought things were finally starting to get better around here. But now everyone's getting sick and nobody knows what to do.
translation: 我还以为情况终于好转了呢。但是现在每个人都病了而没有人知道该怎么办。

original: You better stay away from me. I think I may be sick. It's like a... burning in my guts. Damn, it hurts!
translation: 你最好离我远点。我想我病了。就好像……我的内脏在着火。该死，真疼！

original: If you feel you're getting sick, quarantine yourself at the clinic, immediately.
translation: 如果你觉得你病了，立刻到门诊来进行隔离，一刻也不要耽搁。

original: Let's do this just like the last time. Nobody needs to try and prove anything out there.
translation: 让我们就像上次那样做吧。没必要尝试或证明什么。

original: Everybody goes home after this, you understand? I don't want any screw-ups out there.
translation: 这之后大家都回家去，你明白了吗？我不想有什么麻烦。

original: Everything should be in place by now. Even if they know we're coming, it won't matter.
translation: 这会儿一切都应该就位了。就算他们知道我们要来了，也没关系。

original: It's good to see you again.
translation: 再见到你真是太好了。

original: Brother...
translation: 兄弟……

original: Hey, have you got a second?
translation: 嘿，有时间吗？

original: So, uhh...
translation: 那么，嗯……

original: Listen, I've got a question.
translation: 听着，我有个问题。

original: Can I talk to you for a moment?
translation: 能和你聊两句吗？

original: Scribe Rothchild is going to need an update on your progress. Have you sent a report recently?
translation: 文员罗斯查德想要知道你的工作进度。你最近发过报告了么？

original: I was wondering when you'd show up.
translation: 我刚才还在想你什么时候才能出现呢。

original: Just when I thought I had a moment to think.
translation: 就在我以为我能静静的呆会儿想想问题的时候。

original: This better be good.
translation: 你最好找个像样点的借口。

original: What now?
translation: 现在呢？

original: Hello.
translation: 你好。

original: Hi.
translation: 嗨。

original: Hail.
translation: 致敬。

original: Ahem.
translation: 呃哼。

original: Whew. Long day.
translation: 呼。漫长的一天。

original: The boss is in one of his moods again.
translation: 老板看上去又不爽了。

original: Think I caught the boss napping at his desk again.
translation: 我猜是我又碰到老板在桌上打盹了。

original: You know, I didn't sign up with the Brotherhood to be an errand boy.
translation: 你知道，我来兄弟会工作可不是为了当跑腿儿的。

original: You know, I didn't sign up with the Brotherhood to be an errand girl.
translation: 你知道，我来兄弟会工作可不是为了当跑腿儿的。

original: Gah! One more day of this and I'm gonna eat a bullet.
translation: 呃啊！在这样下去我早晚得玩儿完。

original: Has Lyons forgotten about the war with the Enclave? What the hell are we doing here, really? We have better things to do.
translation: 里昂斯忘了我们和英克雷之间的战争了么？说真的，我们他妈的到底在这儿干什么？我们有更有用的事情要做。

original: I'm not 100% sure it's safe to go in there.
translation: 我不知道去那儿是不是百分之百安全。

original: You know, these chairs aren't very comfortable.
translation: 你知道，这些椅子不是很舒服。

original: Bigsley could really cut us some slack.
translation: 比格斯利能给咱们点好处。

original: The mercenary caravan has returned. They ran into some trouble - Sir? Scribe Bigsley? Is everything alright, sir?
translation: 雇佣商队回来了。他们遇到麻烦了- 长官？比格斯利文员？一切都还好吧，长官？

original: Sir. Some messages arrived for you.
translation: 长官。有消息给您。

original: I just came back from the Citadel.
translation: 我刚从五角大本营回来。

original: Scribe Bigsley? I've finished the corrections to the map.
translation: 比格斯利文员？我已修正好了地图。

original: Sir, the "lab coats" report a delay in the next batch of water.
translation: 长官，"穿白大褂的"报告说下一批次的水会被推迟。

original: One of the scientists fell off some scaffolding and broke an arm.
translation: 一名科研人员从脚手架摔了下来，断了只胳膊。

original: The caravan never returned, sir.
translation: 商队一直都没有回来，长官。

original: A caravan's returned.
translation: 一只商队回来了。

original: Important messages for you, sir.
translation: 有重要的信息给您，长官。

original: Sir. The next shipment of water is buttoned up and ready to go.
translation: 长官。下一批次的水已经装好等待运走了。

original: Sir?
translation: 长官？

original: What the hell are we doing here, really? We have better things to do.
translation: 说真的，我们他妈的到底在这儿干什么？我们有更有用的事情要做。

original: Great. Another water beggar.
translation: 得了，又一个讨水乞丐。

original: What?
translation: 什么？

original: Get outa my face.
translation: 从我眼前消失。

original: What are you looking at?
translation: 你在看什么？

original: Step right up!
translation: 都走近点！

original: The Amazing Aqua Cura!
translation: 神奇的沌浄水！

original: Water...
Atom light your path, friend.
translation: 原子照亮前路，朋友。

original: May the Light be your beacon.
translation: 原此光指引你。

original: Rest in the Glow, friend.
translation: 沐浴那光辉之中吧，朋友。

original: Grrrr...
<sniffing>
Grrrrrloooow
translation: 咯……咯……（光辉）

original: <gurgle>
translation: <咯咯>

original: Arrrr-taaahm.
translation: 啊……特姆（原子）

original: Be at peace, dear.
translation: 保持平静，亲爱的。

original: Strive for the Eternal Light.
translation: 为了永恒之光。

original: May Atom be with you, always.
translation: 愿原子常伴你左右。

original: Nice work, soldier... nice work.
translation: 干的好，士兵……干的好。

original: What brings you back to the Citadel?
translation: 回五角大本营有什么事吗？

original: You look like you've seen some travel. Stop and talk with me a moment.
translation: 看来你经历了不少事吗。来和我聊两句。

original: Well, I'll be a son-of-a-bitch. You actually pulled it off.
translation: 好吧，我快成混蛋了。你竟然把它推迟了。

original: Back, huh? Hope you've been Mutie killing.
translation: 什么，回去？我看你真该去见识见识什么叫变种人杀手。

original: Hey, good to see you back.
translation: 嘿，很高兴再次见到你。

original: Well done! Well done indeed!
translation: 干得好！干的真不错！

original: Welcome back, my friend.
translation: 欢迎回来，我的朋友。

original: Ah, so nice to see you back at the Citadel.
translation: 啊，看到你再次光临五角大本营可真好。

original: You did it! You did it!
translation: 你成功了！你成功了！

original: So, what did you break this time?
translation: 那么，你这会又弄坏什么了？

original: You're back!
translation: 你回来了！

original: I have need of you. Speak to me when you have a moment.
translation: 我想找你帮个忙。有空的时候来找我。

original: Ah, it's you. I hope you've brought something useful.
translation: 啊，是你。希望你带回了有用的东西。

original: You're back? Did you find anything of use to us?
translation: 你回来了？你找到什么对我们有用的东西了么？

original: This is Rivet City water, bud. Now get out of my way.
translation: 这是铆钉城的水，小崽子。现在给我滚。

original: If you want some water, go get it from the Purifier yourself. This is ours now.
translation: 如果你想要点水，自己去净化器那儿弄去。这些是我们的了。

original: It's not for sale. Every drop is for Rivet City residents only.
translation: 这水是非卖品。每一滴都只属于铆钉城居民。

original: Move it, bud. Can't you see I'm busy?
translation: 滚蛋，小崽子。没看见我很忙吗？

original: I hate to complain about free water, but the Brotherhood are being damn stingy with it.
translation: 我不喜欢整天挑免费水的刺儿，但是兄弟会越来越抠门了。

original: I don't know why they don't just build a pipeline. Schlepping bottles of water back and forth is the worst kind of stupid.
translation: 我真搞不明白为什么他们不直接建根水管呢。装在瓶子里一车一车地运来运去简直是我见过的最蠢的主意了。

original: Stand back, unless you want mirelurk crud all over your boots.
translation: 退后，除非你想被泥沼蟹的渣滓弄得你满脚都是。

original: Just my luck to pull mirelurk duty three days in a row...
translation: 只是我幸运的连续三天负责这泥沼蟹的工作了……

original: Shh. If you spook the lurks I'll never get out of here.
translation: 嘘。如果你惊吓了蟹人，那我就再也出不去了。

original: The lurks get real shy when they're sick. You gotta wait for 'em to poke their noses up.
translation: 蟹人生病的时候会非常的胆小。你得等他们浮出水面。

original: Dammit! If I could just twist my wrists a little more...
translation: 该死！只要能再转一下手腕……

original: Almost got it... damn it!
translation: 就差一点……该死！

original: I don't know what the Council was thinking. The Brotherhood should be delivering this water.
translation: 我不知道委员会怎么想的。兄弟会应该负责运水。

original: We're getting our asses kicked out here. I don't know why we have to do the Brotherhood's scut work.
translation: 我们在这儿简直是自找苦吃。我真想不明白为什么要我们来做兄弟会的倒霉工作。

original: This is a damn suicide mission...
translation: 这任务简直就是他妈的自杀……

original: What's that? Don't you see it -- right over there!
translation: 那是什么？你没看见么 -- 就在那儿！

original: Did you hear that? Dammit, they're everywhere!
translation: 你听见了么？该死，它们到处都是！

original: Rivet City is providing water to the Wasteland. Spread the word.
translation: 铆钉城 现正向整个废土提供水源。放话出去。

original: Anybody messes with this caravan, gets the business end of my gun. Got it?
translation: 有谁胆敢惹这只商队，我这把枪就是他最后的归宿。听到了吗？

original: We don't want any trouble.
translation: 我们不想惹麻烦。

original: Outsiders in the Citadel. Such a pleasure...
translation: 五角大本营里的外来人。幸会……

original: Brother...
translation: 兄弟……

original: I've been meaning to ask you...
translation: 我一直想问你……

original: Got a second?
translation: 有空吗？

original: So...
translation: 那么……

original: Hey, let me ask you something.
translation: 嗨，让我问你些问题。

original: Rothchild, a word please.
translation: 罗斯查德，借一步说话。

original: If you have a moment, Scribe Rothchild...
translation: 如果你有时间，文员罗斯查德……

original: I saw that you completed your tests. What results are you seeing?
translation: 我看见你完成你的测试了。你期待得几分？

original: Scribe Rothchild wants a report on your tests. Have your results posted?
translation: 文员罗斯查德想要你的测试报告。你的结果出来了吗？
